title: Hazar-Addar
content:
HAZAR-ADDAR

A town, along with Azmon, that marked the southern border of Judah (Numbers 34:4). It is usually identified with Khirbet el-Qudeirat near Kadesh-barnea.

The parallel passage in Joshua 15:3â€“4 lists four places instead of two:

  • Hezron

  • Addar

  • Karka

  • Azmon

Some have suggested that Hazar-addar and Addar are the same place. Others think they renamed it Hezron to distinguish it from Addar.
